deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.note: {{symbol}} will be deposited to your zkAccount. Once received, you can transfer {{symbol}} privately.
deposit.ddNote: {{symbol}} depositing can take up to 10 minutes.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.note: The transfer will be performed privately. Sender, recipient and amount are never disclosed.
transfer.addressInputHint: The address can be generated in the account modal window

multitransfer.title: Multitransfer
multitransfer.instruction: Add zkAddress, the amount of {{symbol}} to transfer. 1 address per row.
multitransfer.uploadCSVHint: Click Upload CSV to add a prepared .csv file from your machine. Each row should contain: zkAddress, amount

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.note: {{symbol}} will be withdrawn from zkBob and deposited into the provided wallet address.

welcome.title: Welcome to zkBob!
welcome.description: Create a zkAccount to transfer tokens privately with your friends and colleagues.
welcome.descriptionDemo: Transfer BOB privately to friends, use to purchase sponsored items, or transfer to your own private zkAccount.
welcome.bannerDemo: For secure deposits, withdrawals and full-featured privacy, create a <1>zkBob account here</1>

payment.title: Enter {{symbol}} value and choose a token
payment.amountToSend: The amount you'd like to send
payment.limit: The maximum amount to be paid from one address

history.title: History
history.empty:
Make your first Deposit, Transfer or Withdrawal
to create your History.
history.highFee: This transaction required additional operations, resulting in higher fees.

loadingError.description: Please try again later or <1>contact our support</1> if the issue persists.

successNotification.title: The operation has been completed.
successNotification.description: Check the history tab or your zkAccount balance to get more information.

pendingAction.title: Please wait for your $t(glossary.transactions, {"count": {{count}} }) to finalize
pendingAction.description: Do not refresh the page for at least 30 seconds! Transaction $t(glossary.statuses, {"count": {{count}} }) will update automatically.
pendingAction.note: You can deposit, transfer or withdraw funds once the transaction is completed.
pendingAction.note_other: You can deposit, transfer or withdraw funds once the transactions are completed.

swapModal.title: The swap is in progress
swapModal.description: You can close this window and return later to view the results. Do you want to close the window?

start.title: zkAccount
start.description: To start working with zkBob you need a zkAccount

createOptions.title: Choose how you would like to create your account
createOptions.description: By creating zkAccount, you hereby agree to and accept zkBob <1>Terms of Service</1>

restoreOptions.title: How did you create your account?

createWithWallet.title: Create new zkAccount
createWithWallet.description: Choose the wallet that will be associated with your zkAccount

createWithSecret.title: Create new zkAccount
createWithSecret.description: Write down or copy these words in the right order and save them somewhere safe
createWithSecret.warning:
Never share your secret phrase with anyone,
store it securely!

restoreWithWallet.title: Login to your zkAccount
restoreWithWallet.description: Select the wallet you used to create your zkAccount

restoreWithSecret.title: Restore zkAccount
restoreWithSecret.description: Input your saved secret phrase to restore an existing account

confirmSecret.title: Confirm secret phrase
confirmSecret.description:
Please input your secret phrase to verify it.
Click on a word to remove it

signMessageToCreate.title: Sign the message to create your zkAccount
signMessageToCreate.description: Your zkAccount is being created based on the connected wallet.

signMessageToRestore.title: Sign the message to login to your zkAccount
signMessageToRestore.description: Accessing your zkAccount with your connected wallet.

createPasswordPrompt.title: Set up the password?
createPasswordPrompt.description: You can create a secure password that we'll ask you every time when you log in to zkAccount

createPassword.title: Create password
createPassword.description: To enhance security, password entry is required each time a page reloads.

enterPasswordModal.title: Enter password
enterPasswordModal.lostPassword: Lost password? Click here to restore access

confirmLogoutModal.title: Log out and clear browsing data
confirmLogoutModal.description: When you log out your zkAccount information is erased from the data cache and is no longer accessible with your password. Restore the account and balance using your secret phrase and a new password.

demoCard.title: Demo version
demoCard.description1: This zkBob version is designed for private, small-value transfers only (not for deposits/withdrawals).
demoCard.description2: <0>For a full-featured version,</0><1>create a free zkBob account here.</1>

increasedLimitsBanner.inactive: Want to increase your deposit limits?
increasedLimitsBanner.resync: To restore increased deposit limits - <1>resync your BAB token</1>

increasedLimitsModal.title: Extended limits
increasedLimitsModal.paragraph1: To increase personal deposit limits you need to own a BAB token on the BNB Smart chain. What's a BAB token? <1>Find out now.</1>
increasedLimitsModal.step1: Connect the Metamask or WalletConnect wallet containing your BAB token to zkBob. You DO NOT need to switch networks, stay on Polygon.
increasedLimitsModal.step2: Click Verify my BAB token below.
increasedLimitsModal.paragraph3: That's it. Your deposit limits will automatically increase if your connected wallet contains a BAB token.

paymentLinkModal.title: Get payment link
paymentLinkModal.description:
Share this link to request a private payment.
The sender will have the option to select and send any token. Tokens will be converted to {{symbol}} and deposited to your zkAccount.

Note: Private payment links work on the same network where they are generated.
paymentLinkModal.copyAndShare: Copy and share your payment link
paymentLinkModal.getMoreInfo: Get more info about payment links

start.title: You're Lucky!
start.description: On this gift card you will find

createAccount.title:
Before you can redeem
a gift card
createAccount.description: To redeem a gift card you need a zkBob zkAccount! Create an account, or login into an existing account to claim your {{symbol}} tokens.

switchNetwork.title: We need to switch the network
switchNetwork.description: Gift card available only on {{network}}. To redeem it we need to change the network

inProgress.title: Transferring tokens to your zkAccount
inProgress.description: The process takes longer than usual. If the process does not complete within a few seconds, contact our <1>support team</1>

completed.title: Your {{symbol}} is on the way
completed.description: Your tokens will be delivered during the next 1-2 minutes. Check the transaction status on the History tab

failed.error: This gift card has already been used
failed.description: Please contact our support team to resolve this problem. Use Support ID in your request.

restrictionModal.title: zkBob is not supported in this country or region
restrictionModal.description: zkBob is not supported in your country. You will be able to use the application from supported country or region.

secretPhraseModal.title: Show secret phrase
secretPhraseModal.warning:
Never share your secret phrase with anyone,
store it securely!
secretPhraseModal.description: If someone has your secret phrase they will have full control of your wallet.

descriptions.deposited:
Your {{amount}} {{symbol}} deposit to the zero knowledge pool is in progress.

To increase the level of privacy, consider keeping the tokens in the zero knowledge pool for some time before withdrawal.
descriptions.transferred: Your {{amount}} {{symbol}} transfer within the zero knowledge pool is in progress.
descriptions.transferredMulti: Your {{amount}} {{symbol}} multitransfer within the zero knowledge pool is in progress.
descriptions.withdrawn: Your {{amount}} {{symbol}} withdrawal from the zero knowledge pool is in progress.
descriptions.signatureExpired: Your signature has expired. Please try again.
descriptions.suspiciousAccountDeposit: We found that your wallet was involved in suspicious activities. Because of this, you can't use this wallet at zkBob. Please, try another wallet.
descriptions.suspiciousAccountWithdrawal: We found that the recipient's address was involved in suspicious activities. Because of this, you can't withdraw funds to this address.
descriptions.wrongNetwork: Failed to switch the network. Please connect your wallet to {{network}} and try again.
descriptions.approved: Your approval was successful. Now you can deposit your tokens.
descriptions.sent:
Payment processing can take up to 10 minutes.
<1>View the transaction

or download
<2><3>Payment statement
descriptions.signMessage: You need to sign a message allowing the contract to use your tokens for the deposit.

maxButton.tooltip: Click Max to set the maximum amount of {{symbol}} you can send including all fees and limits

connectWalletModal.title: Connect web3 wallet
connectWalletModal.description: Connect your wallet to deposit {{symbol}} into your zkAccount. If you are creating a new zkAccount, your wallet is used to derive a private encryption key for the zkBob application.
connectWalletModal.note:
By connecting a wallet, you agree to zkBob
<1>Terms of Service

qrCode.title: QR code address
qrCode.description:
To receive a private transfer from another zkAccount, your friend can scan this code from their app.
The other user just has to scan your QR code on the Transfer page

zkAccount.addressDescription: Use this address to receive tokens to your zkBob account. You create a new address each time you connect. Receive tokens to this address or a previously generated address.
